title: House Republicans Pass Trumpcare: A Closer Look | Shane Smith | Tara Donnelly & Manny Morales
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the House Republicans rushing a bill, which will strip health insurance from millions of Americans, without knowing what's in it. (0:20)
Then, VICE's Shane Smith talks to Seth about his idiosyncratic adventures across the globe. He also talks to segment producer Henry Melcher for a few additional questions backstage in a podcast exclusive. (11:03)
In a new edition of Late Night Chats, Tara Donnelly and Manny Morales of the Late Night graphics team chat about their day-to-day task of creating art for Late Night. (20:51)
